name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We Become What We Behold Unblocked

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We Become What We Behold Unblocked

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the viral chaos of modern media in We Become What We Behold, now as a Chrome Extension! In this short yet powerful game, your job is to capture moments that shape public perception. Take snapshots of the world and watch how each image influences society, creating a ripple effect of reactions, fears, and trends.

Explore the dark, humorous, and thought-provoking consequences of media manipulation in this unique experience. Can you control the narrative, or will it spiral out of control? Find out in this media-centric simulation, right in your browser.
